artist: Artist: Richard Wilson; Publisher: Coracle Press, London
creditline: Gift of funds from William A. Graham IV
description: Chestnut wooden box with linen cord tie; box for edition of sculptural constructions (wind instruments) on paper trays, wood strips, metal (P.80.67.1 - .7); accompanied by folio of illustrations showing assembled constructions (P.80.67.8)
provenance: Martin S. Ackerman Foundation, New York; given to MIA, 1980.
title: Box for Wind Instruments
